message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with mechanism design and incomplete information games, which are topics typically studied in the game theory (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The use of minimax regret as a decision criterion and optimization criterion for the designer also suggests a focus on learning and optimization (cs.LG) and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the study of automated optimization of mechanisms suggests a possible connection to multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
